title: Resume Question and Answer Builder
original_prompt:
You are now an expert resume analyst. Your job is to have a full understanding on the provided resume. You need to ask the user to provide their {resume:Contact ranjan.cse@gmail.com www.linkedin.com/in/ranjandailata-2742403 (LinkedIn) aezion.com (Company) Top Skills Microsoft SQL Server XML .NET Ranjan Dailata Enterprise Architect at Aezion Inc Bengaluru, Karnataka, India Summary Experience : Enterprise Architect, ML Engineer, Solutions Architect, Lead Developer (Full Stack)/Application Architect(Role) Analyze and create High Level , Detailed Design documents.  Use UML Modelling and create Use Cases, Class Diagram, Component Model , Deployment Diagram, Sequence Diagram in HLD. Good Understanding of Healthcare Domain. Specialized in Analyzing requirements based on the ANSI Spec. Experience with : C# , VB.NET, J2EE , J2ME, Windows Phone 8, Windows Store App, Windows Azure (Worker Role, Cloud Services, Azure Website, Document DB etc), AWS (EC2, Email, Queue, S3, API Gateway, RDS) , AngularJS, Angular 8, Node.JS etc. Software Development Database : Microsoft SQL Server, FoxPro, Mongo DB, MySQL, Postgres Development Frameworks : Microsoft .NET 1.1, 2.0, 3.5, 4.5, 4.6+ .NET Core 3.1* Desktop Development : Windows Forms, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) Web Development : ASP.NET WebForm and MVC3, MVC4, MVC5, MVC6 Web Service : Legacy Web Service, WCF, Web API 2.0, .NET Core Web API Automation/E2E/Unit/Integration Testing Selenium C#, Protractor, Webdriver.IO, Nunit, XUnit, MSUnit, Moq, Jasmin, Karma.JS Page 1 of 6 Tools for application Development: Microsoft Visual Studio, Sublime, VS Code, SQL Management Studio etc. Containerization Technologies: Kubernetes, Docker Healthcare Domain Experience CCD, CCR, QRDA, HIE, HL7 V3, Healthcare Interoperability Cutting Edge Technologies:  Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence Natural Language Processing Blockchain (Stratis, NEO, Ethereum, Bigchain DB) Smart Contracts (Ethereum, Stratis, RSK). Good experience with Solidity programming. Specialties: Healthcare Domain, Synthetic Data Generation Natural Language Processing Related 1. Sentiment Analysis 2. Named Entity Recognition 3. Summarization 4. Topic Modeling 5. Emotion Detection 6. Keyword Extraction 7. Question Answering 8. Similarity Determination Experience Aezion, Inc Enterprise Architect July 2022 - Present (3 months) Mysore, Karnataka, India Page 2 of 6 Build the next-generation products on AI/ML, Blockchain, NFT, etc. Involved in architecting, designing, and building cutting-edge technology-based products targeting various domains. Symbl.ai Solutions Architect March 2022 - July 2022 (5 months) Remote Symbl is an AI-powered, API first, Conversation Intelligence platform for natural human conversations that works on audio, video, and textual content in real-time or recorded files. Symbl’s APIs let you generate real-time Sentiment Analysis, Action Items, Topics, Trackers, Summary and much more in your applications. Sybml builds AI that understands natural human conversations, creating a new category in voice tech infrastructure — “Conversation Intelligence as a Service” Aezion Solutions Architect October 2018 - March 2022 (3 years 6 months) Mysore Area, India Design and development of highly complex scalable, extensible, easy to maintain/manage and performance-oriented applications. Responsibilities:  1) Solution Design and Development of Applications for Healthcare, Ecommerce, Finance, Construction and Real-estate domain. 2) Custom libraries for Caching, Data Access, Logging. 3) Design and Development of Web Service/Web API's with Authentication & Authorization using OAuth JWT. 4) Analyze and design feasible custom or standard solutions for complex and challenging requirements. 5) Design, Develop, Review code by applying standard patterns and practices. 6) Analyze requirements and come out with a SOLID design and provide solutions or implement the same using suitable tools and technologies. 7) Choose best tools, frameworks or build custom ones, reuse opensource tools and technologies based on the projects/products. Page 3 of 6 8) Developed High Critical/Challenging nature of Apps using suitable technologies like .NET C#, Node.JS, AngularJS etc. 9) Provide architectural guidance and training on latest technologies to developers. 10) Custom Caching using Redis. 11) Custom search using Elastic Search. 12) Help the team in developing products using Microservices. 13) Help the team to Architect and implement Quick books integration (Both Legacy and Online). 14) Help the team with the Payment Gateway Integrations like Fullsteam, Stripe, Authorize.NET 15) Help the team in building the custom components or shared services. Research and Development A key player in building the libraries/framework required for solving the most complex and modern/next-generation technologies. Aezion Mysore, is set up to ease the research and development of modern and advanced technologies that can help the company to grow. Blockchain, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Custom Chat bot Development etc. are being researched and developed. AIM Specialty Health 3 years Developer Advisor September 2016 - 2018 (2 years) Deerfield Lead Developer/Application Architect (Role). Heavily work on .NET C#, AngularJS, Node.js and micro-services. Review and Approve Business Requirement Solution Designing Co-ordinate and work with the Dev Team, BA, Data Architect, QA and PM Develop and Review code Follow coding standards, Apply patterns and maintain a high quality code base Pair Programming with Application Dev's Mentor Developers and work closely in executing tasks Build Interface Catalogs with the detailed work breakdown structure Take architectural decisions, Build product framework, templates etc. Enhance existing Framework and Core Services Page 4 of 6 Developer Senior October 2015 - 2018 (3 years) Deerfield AIM Specialty Health® ("AIM") is focused on driving appropriate, safe and affordable care through the health care system. For more than 42 million members covered across 50 states, D.C. and US territories, AIM targets the quality and cost of clinical services including radiology, cardiology, oncology, specialty drugs and sleep medicine. As a national leader in specialty benefits management, AIM helps health plans, providers, and employers focus on the value of health decisions with an integrated suite of solutions combining clinical excellence, technology, and superior customer service. AIM is a wholly owned subsidiary of Anthem, Inc. (ANTM) Morrisey Associates, Inc. Software Application Developer February 2013 - September 2015 (2 years 8 months) Chicago-based Morrisey Associates is a world-class healthcare solutions provider, offering a comprehensive suite of best-of-breed credentialing and care management applications, along with industry-leading consulting services and flexible licensing options. Quality Systems, Inc Technical Specialist April 2011 - November 2012 (1 year 8 months) Bangalore , India Quality Systems, Inc. (QSI) and its NextGen Healthcare subsidiary provide clinical, financial and connectivity solutions for ambulatory, inpatient and dental providers to empower patient-centered care and deliver results. HealthAsyst Private Limited Senior Developer October 2008 - April 2011 (2 years 7 months) Develop applications for Health Care Insurance Claiming , Remittance Accelerated Sytems Private Limited R&D Engineer May 2007 - September 2008 (1 year 5 months) Worked on Hardware Software Interfacing project AMR (Automatic Meter Reading ) , Developed ERP applications. Page 5 of 6 NIC Inc. Developer August 2006 - May 2007 (10 months) Bangalore Developed .NET application for Karnataka State Food Corporation of India. Design and Development of Mobile application using J2ME for APMC. Hindustan Aeronautics Limited Trainee September 2005 - July 2006 (11 months) Worked as a Trainee Engineer. Education Coorg Institute of Technology, PONNAMPET B.E, Computer Science · (2001 - 2005) ST Josephs Hunsur Page 6 of 6} 

Analyze the resume and prepare a list of question and answers

input1_ans:
Based on the provided resume for John Doe, here is a list of questions and answers that can help analyze the resume further:

### Questions and Answers

1. **Q: What is John Doe's current job title and where does he work?**
   - A: John Doe is a Senior Software Engineer at Tech Solutions.

2. **Q: What are John Doe's top technical skills?**
   - A: His top skills include JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

3. **Q: What is John Doe's experience in terms of years?**
   - A: He has approximately 6 years of experience in software development.

4. **Q: What methodologies does John Doe specialize in?**
   - A: He specializes in analyzing requirements based on Agile methodology.

5. **Q: What types of applications has John Doe developed?**
   - A: He has developed scalable web applications, RESTful APIs, and integrated third-party services.

6. **Q: What cloud technologies is John Doe familiar with?**
   - A: He is familiar with AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.

7. **Q: What is John Doe's educational background?**
   - A: He holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley.

8. **Q: What tools does John Doe use for application development?**
   - A: He uses Visual Studio Code, Git, Postman, Docker, and Jenkins.

9. **Q: What is John Doe's experience with testing frameworks?**
   - A: He has experience with Jest, Mocha, Chai, and Cypress for automation, E2E, unit, and integration testing.

10. **Q: What role did John Doe have at XYZ Corp?**
    - A: He worked as a Full Stack Developer, where he developed and maintained web applications.

11. **Q: How does John Doe contribute to team dynamics?**
    - A: He collaborates with cross-functional teams, mentors junior developers, and conducts code reviews.

12. **Q: What cutting-edge technologies is John Doe experienced with?**
    - A: He has experience with microservices, serverless architecture, and progressive web apps (PWAs).

13. **Q: What was John Doe's role at ABC Inc.?**
    - A: He was a Junior Developer, assisting in the development of web applications and performing testing and debugging.

14. **Q: How long has John Doe been in his current position?**
    - A: He has been in his current position since January 2021, which is approximately 2 years.

15. **Q: What is John Doe's location?**
    - A: He is located in San Francisco, California, USA.

These questions and answers provide a comprehensive overview of John Doe's qualifications, experience, and skills as presented in his resume.

input2_ans:
Based on the provided resume for Jane Smith, here is a list of questions and answers that can help analyze her qualifications and experiences:

### Questions and Answers

1. **Q: What is Jane Smith's current job title and where does she work?**
   - A: Jane Smith is a Data Scientist at Innovate Tech in New York, New York, USA.

2. **Q: What are Jane's top skills?**
   - A: Jane's top skills include Python, Django, and Machine Learning.

3. **Q: What methodologies does Jane specialize in?**
   - A: Jane specializes in analyzing requirements based on the CRISP-DM methodology.

4. **Q: What programming languages and tools is Jane proficient in?**
   - A: Jane is proficient in Python, R, SQL, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, and various cloud technologies like AWS and Google Cloud Platform.

5. **Q: What experience does Jane have in the financial services domain?**
   - A: Jane has a good understanding of the financial services domain and has developed predictive models and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data.

6. **Q: Can you describe Jane's role at Innovate Tech?**
   - A: At Innovate Tech, Jane develops predictive models and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data and collaborates with stakeholders to deliver actionable insights.

7. **Q: What was Jane's previous position before Innovate Tech?**
   - A: Before Innovate Tech, Jane worked as a Machine Learning Engineer at ABC Financial Services.

8. **Q: What kind of projects did Jane work on at ABC Financial Services?**
   - A: At ABC Financial Services, Jane designed and implemented machine learning models for fraud detection and risk assessment, and conducted data preprocessing and feature engineering.

9. **Q: What educational qualifications does Jane have?**
   - A: Jane holds a Master’s degree in Data Science from New York University and a Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics.

10. **Q: What tools does Jane use for data analysis and visualization?**
    - A: Jane uses tools such as Tableau, Power BI, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for data analysis and visualization.

11. **Q: What experience does Jane have with cloud technologies?**
    - A: Jane has experience with AWS (including SageMaker and Redshift) and Google Cloud Platform.

12. **Q: How long has Jane been working in her current role?**
    - A: Jane has been working as a Data Scientist at Innovate Tech for 1 year and 8 months.

13. **Q: What is Jane's experience with automation and testing?**
    - A: Jane has experience with automation and testing using tools like PyTest and Unittest.

14. **Q: What is Jane's approach to data-driven strategies?**
    - A: Jane assists in the development of data-driven strategies for clients by analyzing large datasets to identify trends and patterns.

15. **Q: What cutting-edge technologies is Jane familiar with?**
    - A: Jane is familiar with Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Big Data Analytics.

This structured Q&A format provides a comprehensive overview of Jane Smith's qualifications, skills, and experiences as outlined in her resume.
